thread.title: Nowitzki's golf swing needs some work
thread.title_full: Nowitzki's golf swing needs some work

author: Kyle Newport
title: Nowitzki's golf swing needs some work
text:
Nowitzki's golf swing needs some work Bleacher Report 12 hrs ago Kyle Newport Dirk Nowitzki the basketball player is a 13-time All-Star, a former league MVP and a champion.
AdChoices Dirk Nowitzki the golfer isn't quite as accomplished as the hoopster version of himself.
The Dallas Mavericks held the "Mavs Masters" at the Hackberry Creek Country Club on Wednesday afternoon. It appears as though everyone had a good time at the event, but that doesn't mean the results were always pretty.
Just look at this shot from Nowitzki. The 37-year-old Mavericks star was attempting to hit the ball to the green, but it didn't go as far as he had hoped.
Nowitzki responded by showing off his sense of humor:
@BR_NBA haters...
â€” Dirk Nowitzki (@swish41) October 15, 2015 On the plus side, he has no trouble getting buckets on the court.
[ Dallas Mavericks , h/t HoopsHype ]
